title: Are Aquarius and Leo Compatible? Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: Aquarius and Leo are opposites on the zodiac wheel, but this creates a balanced relationship.
steps.content: Aquarius and Leo are opposites on the zodiac wheel, but this creates a balanced relationship. They feel like the other sign is magnetically attracting them to each other—they may even feel like the other sign has traits that complete them. Aquarius tends to be driven by ideas and coming up with new ways of changing the world. Leo is more about action, so they can help Aquarius realize their ideas. They're both social signs, although Aquarius enjoys being surrounded by friends while Leo loves to be the center of attention. Aquarius isn't usually one to be jealous, so this isn't a problem. Aquarius is a fixed sign, so they don't like to change their mind once it's made up. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. Leo is a cardinal sign, so they're more flexible and intuitive. This combination works as long as they communicate and don't start to resent each other. Aquarius inspires Leo to think about larger issues like social change or the future instead of focusing on themselves. [2] X Research source

steps.title: These two are slow to commit to a relationship, but they're loyal when they do.
steps.content: These two are slow to commit to a relationship, but they're loyal when they do. As an air sign, Aquarius doesn't like feeling tied down to a relationship. Flirty Leo also finds that they enjoy the thrill of the chase too much to settle down. This isn't to say that the Aquarius-Leo couple won't commit—it just takes them time! Once they're in a relationship, they're loyal to each other. Compatibility tip: Aquarius tends to blur the lines between love and friendship. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Leo shouldn't worry about this—keep being friendly with Aquarius until they're comfortable enough to take the relationship to the next level.

steps.title: This couple has great sexual chemistry!
steps.content: This couple has great sexual chemistry! Opposite signs on the zodiac usually have sexual compatibility that's off the charts. Aquarius and Leo are no exception. Aquarius is fun, bold, and spontaneous when it comes to sex, and Leo is physically driven. They make it clear to Aquarius that they want to connect physically, so sexual compatibility is high. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Compatibility tip: Leo might crave more attention and sensuality when it comes to lovemaking. [5] X Research source Both signs should communicate their sexual needs to each other so they're both satisfied.

steps.title: Aquarius and Leo are stubborn signs, but it works if they focus on their partner's needs.
steps.content: Aquarius and Leo are stubborn signs, but it works if they focus on their partner's needs. Aquarius can seem emotionally distant, especially since they value their space. Since Leo is more in touch with their feelings, they may think Aquarius is cold or aloof. Leo thrives on being seen and appreciated, so this can cause some friction. Aquarius might think Leo is too dramatic at times. Compatibility tip: Aquarius should recognize Leo and go out of their way to be affectionate. Leo should occasionally offer Aquarius space to be alone. Both signs will appreciate their partner's awareness of their needs.

steps.title: Although these two have different communication styles, they can work together.
steps.content: Although these two have different communication styles, they can work together. Aquarius is driven by the head. They're the one who will logically approach an issue whereas Leo is driven by the heart. They'll be emotional and sometimes dramatic when talking about issues in the relationship. Fortunately, they're usually able to see the other sign's point of view. [6] X Research source Compatibility tip: Aquarius should remind themself that Leo reacts emotionally because they care. Leo actually enjoys trying to convince Aquarius to get worked up enough to argue. Either way, these two can communicate if they remember that they're just different!

steps.title: Aquarius and Leo have different emotional styles, but they have a fun relationship.
steps.content: Aquarius and Leo have different emotional styles, but they have a fun relationship. Aquarius can't help but be drawn toward fiery Leo's bold, charismatic personality. Leo is curious about Aquarius's creative, intellectual nature. When these two share their ideas, their relationship can blossom. Communication is vital to this relationship—Aquarius needs to remember that Leo can be dramatic and react emotionally while Leo should remember that Aquarius reacts with logic. If they can see issues or arguments from the other's perspective, they'll usually figure out a way to solve their problems.
